name: EXTREME POKER
description:
Not to mention game poker familiar in the game room and COOL 104 (What if?), Of course, changing soldiers, you can experience the fun of making fun of not being able to meet usually, bingo × poker, nervous breakdown × poker nervously Includes poker game.


■ From standard to original, enjoy 5 games
- VIDEO
General video poker
Change your hand only once and make a role!

- SOLITAIRE
Let's make a role by replacing your hand with a set of 53 cards
Earn chips based on the number and strength of the roles you made!

- COOL 104
Let's take out the same mark or number cards in succession from the hand
If you can play poker in hand, win bonus chips!

- BINGO
Bingo game using playing cards
Earn bonus chips if you can play a role in the bingo column by swapping the card's squares!

- MEMORY
Let's hold cards by turning cards in the manner of nervous weakness and hold 5 cards!
Acquire chips by strength of the role of held cards!

- DOUBLE UP
Challenge double up with chips acquired in game!
Let's draw more cards from your hand than the cards presented!

■ Customize card with acquired chip
Consuming the acquired chip, you can customize each side of the front and back of the card to your favorite design!
Let's play with a card of your choice from among many designs!
intro: From classic to original, 5 games based on poker rules are included!
